HomePage.title: AI Polaroid Photo Generator ‚Äî Nostalgic Instant Memories
HomePage.description: Create nostalgic instant camera style photos with AI-powered filters, film grain, and storytelling templates for share-ready memories in minutes.

hero.title: Capture memories in classic polaroid style
hero.description: Transform any photo into a warm, retro instant print with authentic white borders, film grain, and cinematic lighting. No prompt skills required.

stats.title: Why creators choose AI Polaroid Photo

features.title: Crafted for social storytelling
features.description: Everything you need to turn everyday moments into shareable, emotional keepsakes.

items.title: Authentic film finishes
items.description: Choose from calibrated looks inspired by Kodak Portra, Fujifilm FP-100C, SX-70 and custom Nano Banana presets.

items.title: Scene-aware rendering
items.description: Gemini analyzes pose, lighting, and framing to keep faces natural while adding dreamy highlights and glow.

items.title: Emotion-driven prompts
items.description: Built-in storytelling templates for celeb meetups, reunion hugs, vintage fashion shoots, and more.

items.title: One-click social outputs
items.description: Export optimized crops for Instagram Stories, Xiaohongshu posts, and printable 3√ó4" keepsakes.

workflow.title: Create in three simple steps

steps.title: Upload & describe
steps.description: Drop in a selfie or group photo and choose the mood you want ‚Äî from golden-hour romantic to 90s camcorder.

steps.title: Pick a template
steps.description: Select a ready-made prompt pack that styles borders, captions, and filters for your story.

steps.title: Generate & refine
steps.description: Review up to four variations, tweak grain or lighting, then save, download, or share instantly.

workflow.description: Go from photo upload to share-ready polaroids without touching complex prompt strings.

templates.title: Template collections included

items.title: Celeb Selfie Set
items.description: Meet your idols with natural posing, flash bloom, and autograph overlays.

items.title: Reunion Stories
items.description: Warm grain and soft focus tuned for hugging your childhood self or long-distance family.

items.title: Retro Fashion Diaries
items.description: High-contrast film with stylized typography for Y2K street snaps and magazine covers.

templates.description: Curated prompt packs and overlays for every storytelling moment.

testimonials.title: Loved by nostalgic creators

items.name: Lena ¬∑ Lifestyle blogger
items.quote: ‚ÄúMy Xiaohongshu followers triple-tapped the Gemini polaroids ‚Äî they look like real film from my dad's archive.‚Äù

items.name: Marcus ¬∑ Wedding filmmaker
items.quote: ‚ÄúWe deliver AI polaroid thank-you cards minutes after the ceremony. Couples are obsessed.‚Äù

items.name: Aya ¬∑ K-pop fan artist
items.quote: ‚ÄúThe celeb meet and greet prompts are magic. I can finally imagine polaroids with my bias.‚Äù

testimonials.description: Creators across weddings, fandoms, and lifestyle blogs rely on AI Polaroid Photo to deliver instant nostalgia.

cta.title: Ready to print your memories?
cta.description: Start with 2 free AI polaroid renders daily. Upgrade for HD exports, batch generation, and custom LoRA styles.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions

items.question: Do I need prompt engineering experience?
items.answer: No. Our curated templates layer Gemini prompts, camera metadata, and filter settings automatically. You can still customize keywords if you want finer control.

items.question: Can I print the photos?
items.answer: Yes. Download high-resolution JPEGs optimized for 3√ó4" polaroid printers or send directly to our print partners from the export panel.

items.question: Is my data private?
items.answer: Uploads are encrypted, auto-deleted after 72 hours, and never used to train third-party models. Enable local-only processing in settings for extra control.

items.question: Which devices are supported?
items.answer: AI Polaroid Photo works in modern mobile and desktop browsers. Install the PWA for a native-like experience on iOS and Android.

faq.subtitle: Answers to common questions about tips, printing, privacy, and supported devices.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your creative flow
pricing.description: Start free with two daily renders. Upgrade for HD exports, batch generation, and custom styles.

AIPolaroidPage.title: AI Polaroid Photo
AIPolaroidPage.description: Everything you need to generate nostalgic instant photos online.

hero.title: Design your AI polaroid experience
hero.description: Build moodboards, manage prompt packs, and publish galleries that turn AI outputs into real stories.

sections.title: Core capabilities
body: Auto-detect lighting and faces to keep results natural while adding authentic film glow.
Save favorite looks as reusable collections for events, fandoms, or clients.

sections.title: Built for teams and creators
body: Collaborate with editors through shared folders and approval workflows.
Track performance metrics like saves, exports, and social share rate.

AIPolaroidGeneratorPage.title: AI Polaroid Generator
AIPolaroidGeneratorPage.description: A deep dive into the generator workspace and controls.

hero.title: Generate cinematic polaroids without guesswork
hero.description: Experience live previews, guided prompts, and Gemini-powered rendering tuned for instant film aesthetics.

sections.title: Workspace highlights
body: Side-by-side variations render in seconds so you can compare lighting and mood instantly.
Adjust color grade, border width, caption overlays, and grain strength without leaving the canvas.

sections.title: Advanced controls
body: Prompt composer merges your keywords with camera metadata and film stocks like Kodak Portra or Fuji Instax.
Batch mode lets you produce up to 20 consistent shots for albums, campaigns, or merch drops.

sections.title: Output formats
body: Square 1:1 for feed posts, vertical 9:16 for Stories and Reels, and 3√ó4 inch 300 DPI for physical prints.
Export layered files with transparent borders when you need custom layouts in Figma or Canva.

AIPolaroidTemplatesPage.title: AI Polaroid Templates
AIPolaroidTemplatesPage.description: Curated template packs inspired by the community's favorite storytelling moments.

hero.title: Template packs that speak your language
hero.description: From celeb meetups to retro travel logs, each pack blends prompts, overlays, and typography for instant results.

sections.title: What you get
body: Prompt recipes tuned for Gemini Nano Banana, Midjourney, and custom LoRA styles.
Matching border frames, captions, stickers, and handwriting fonts for cohesive storytelling.

sections.title: Popular collections
body: Celeb Selfie Studio ‚Äî designed for fans who want a believable autograph moment.
Reunion Therapy ‚Äî warm, low-contrast presets ideal for hugging your younger self or long-distance family.
Runway Archives ‚Äî high-fashion poses, chromatic aberration, and magazine-style typography.

AIVintagePhotoPage.title: AI Vintage Photo Effects
AIVintagePhotoPage.description: Recreate classic film moods with modern AI tooling.

hero.title: Turn digital shots into timeless vintage keepsakes
hero.description: Mix Nano Banana's precision with handcrafted LUTs, dust overlays, and light leaks for believable film outputs.

sections.title: Film science, simplified
body: Color science profiles emulate Kodak, Polaroid, Ilford, and expired film palettes.
Adaptive grain scales to your export size so textures stay sharp when printed.

sections.title: Use cases
body: Content creators producing nostalgia content for Xiaohongshu and TikTok.
Wedding and event teams offering same-day polaroid wall experiences.
Brand activations that need on-location instant prints without analog gear.

GalleryPage.title: AI Polaroid Gallery
GalleryPage.description: Explore curated examples generated by creators and brand partners.

hero.title: See what's possible with AI polaroids
hero.description: Discover trending looks, community spotlights, and campaign-ready layouts updated every week.

sections.title: Featured showcases
body: Creator spotlights highlighting top-performing Xiaohongshu posts.
Brand collaborations featuring event activations and pop-up print bars.

sections.title: How to get featured
body: Tag #aipolaroidphoto on social or submit via the in-app gallery uploader.
Share behind-the-scenes prompts and lighting notes to help others recreate the look.

TutorialsPage.title: AI Polaroid Tutorials
TutorialsPage.description: Step-by-step guides for crafting the perfect AI polaroid story.

hero.title: Master the AI polaroid workflow
hero.description: Follow quick tutorials to capture, generate, refine, and publish your instant photo narratives.

sections.title: Starter lessons
body: Picking the right source photo and framing for AI rendering.
Using mood boards and references to guide template selection.

sections.title: Advanced techniques
body: Editing prompts for different lighting scenarios like neon nights or daylight flash.
Combining LoRA styles with overlays to build a signature brand aesthetic.

PolicyUgcPage.title: UGC & Copyright Policy
PolicyUgcPage.description: Creators may upload only media they have rights to use. We review takedown requests within 24 hours and provide safe remix tools.
body: AI Polaroid Photo lets you combine your own photos with AI-generated effects. Only upload images, prompts, and overlays you have permission to use.
We do not host unlicensed celebrity likenesses or commercial IP. For takedown requests, email support@aipolaroidphoto.org with relevant URLs and proof of ownership. We respond within 24 hours.

hero.title: Launch the editor and generate your first AI polaroid instantly
hero.description: Describe the mood, people, or story and the right column renders a border-ready polaroid in real time.

features.title: Instant results
features.description: Dual rendering engines deliver a high-resolution polaroid in under ten seconds.

features.title: Authentic film texture
features.description: Borders, captions, and light leaks recreate the look of true instant cameras.

features.title: Template presets
features.description: Switch between travel, wedding, and cafe vibes to match your narrative.

promptCard.title: Polaroid prompt engine
promptCard.description: Describe the scene and we will develop the AI polaroid for you instantly.

tabs.textToImageDescription: Use Text to Image mode to create polaroids directly from your description.

siliconflow.name: SiliconFlow
siliconflow.description: Balanced quality model for crisp, detailed polaroids.

nanoBanana.name: Nano Banana
nanoBanana.description: Flux-based engine tuned for lightning-fast previews.

promptEnhancements.vintagePolaroid: Shot on vintage polaroid film with warm tones, soft focus, natural light leaks, and a handwritten caption along the bottom border.
promptEnhancements.retroFilm: Captured like a retro film photo with subtle grain, low saturation, and a nostalgic color palette.
promptEnhancements.modernMinimal: Minimalist studio lighting with crisp edges, clean composition, and a refined instant film border.
promptEnhancements.artisticSketch: Rendered as an artistic sketch with pencil shading, textured paper, and a hand-drawn instant film border.

batch.title: Batch processing
batch.description: Enable batch mode to develop multiple polaroid shots at once.
